summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

value.span: 返回值，该值指示返回相关关系对象的类定义。

span.span: Returns a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖以前存储在对象中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 其副作用是，作为查询字符串重新生成，以反映新的标志。As a side-effect, the query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果查询请求的结果集; 只能使用类定义，否则为`false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instance query.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instance query.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性的值将覆盖以前存储在对象中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果此查询应求得架构;`false`如果实例应计算查询。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
